old:
<COL ffdc78>《目覚めし闇の魔物》は</COL>
最大８人のパーティーを結成して
《ボルド大坑道》に現れた大いなる脅威と戦う
エクストリームミッションです

各所に出現する敵を討伐して封印を解き
最後に現れる強敵を討ち果たしましょう
new:
<COL ffdc78>The Demon of Darkness Awakens</COL>
is an Extreme Mission where you form a party of up to 8 people and fight against the great threat that has appeared in the Volden Large Tunnels.

Defeat the enemies that appear throughout and break their seals.
Finally, confront and defeat the powerful enemy that awaits.

old:
なお、各所の敵は<COL ffdc78>討伐に時間をかけすぎると
更に強力な魔物が出現してしまいます</COL>

パーティー内で連携をとり
迅速に討伐していきましょう
new:
Furthermore,<COL ffdc78> if you spend too much time defeating enemies in various places, even more powerful enemies will appear.</COL>

Coordinate within the party and swiftly defeat them.
